Secured by design is a police-led initiative which focuses on how the design of the public realm can create places that are safe or unsafe, or perceived as such by those who use them. Developers should refer to the relevant guidance in relation to counter-terrorist and crime prevention security and engage fully in the pre-application process in order to ensure that measures to mitigate risks are incorporated into developments, where appropriate.
